title: ESA TIMETABLE
content: Will this be the final timetable for sem 2 BTech? Or will there be changes made to it?

comments.body: Tf so unfair to c cycle people, we had exams at morning when we were in p cycle, and we have the exams at the same time now fuck pes
dw this is a canon event
How is it fair for phy cycle people tho?
Wait are all sem 2 timetables like this??üò≠üò≠
Unpopular opinion but I'd prefer exams happening in the morning more than the same happening in the afternoon
Coz u nearer to clg? People who are far have the problem
Also one less holiday than phy cycle people ü´¢

No not really, I live pretty far from college lol

It's just that I don't fw the idea of writing the exam in the afternoon because I feel comparatively less productive than I do in the morning

Yeah one half of students have it in afternoon both sems and the other half have it in morning both sems. In our case we also had a day less for subject (don't remember which one) than the other batch to study

Same here, and I lived 90 mins away from campus. I used to have ESAs from 1:30-4:30, and that basically meant after I reached home there wasn't really any energy or time to do anything. 

Now, I've got exams at even worse times - last semester my exam was from 7-9 pm üò≠
Was the evs/constitution exam the last? Or right in the middle?

Its just called ‚Äúdraft‚Äù 
This will only be the final esa timetable :D
If u want changes means talk to ur dept and seek their help
Usually they dont change
